shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Introduction (fol. 62ra-62vb) - The “Synopsis of Classes” (fol. 62ra-62vb) II) Gospel of Matthew (fols. 2ra-10vb; 20ra-24ra; 61ra-61vb; 63ra-94vb) - Bǝsratä Matewos “Gospel of Matthew” (fols. 2ra-10vb; 20ra-24ra; 63ra-94vb) - List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of Matthew: 69 titles (fol.61ra-61vb) III) Gospel of Mark (fols. 1ra-1vb; 24ra-24vb; 114ra-137rb) - Bǝsratä Marqos “Gospel of Mark” (fols. 1ra-1vb; 114ra-137rb) - List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of Mark: 46 titles (fol.24ra-24vb) IV) Gospel of Luke (fols. 25ra-55rb; 56ra-60vb; 137ra-139vb) - Bǝsratä Luqas “Gospel of Luke” (fols. 25ra-55rb; 56ra-60vb; 139ra-139vb) - List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of Luke: 84 titles (fols.137ra-138vb) V) Gospel of John (fols. 11ra-23vb; 55rb; 95ra-113vb) - Bǝsratä Yoḥannǝs “Gospel of John” (fols. 11ra-23vb; 95ra-113vb) - List of the “tituli” for the Gospel of John: 19 titles (fol. 55rb)
Additiones 1-5.

donors.donor: The book was bought by Täklä Sämaʿt (s. Additio 3).

dcomments.dcomment: Additio 4, written in a more recent hand, mentions Patriarch of Alexandria ʾabba Matthew (III; in tenure 1631-46), and Metropolitan of Ethiopia ʾabba Marqos (III; 1634-47/48; s. EAE III, 790a-91b).

txstates.txstate: The Ms. is in deprecate condition. Both wooden boards are missing; the threads of the binding are missing. The fols. are in disorder; many are missing.

bindings.binding: The original binding (two wooden boards, two pairs of sewing stations?) is completely destroyed: both wooden boards and the threads of the binding are missing.

squires.squire: The structure of the quires cannot be established due to the present condition of the Ms.

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; “tituli” written in the upper margins; numbers of the chapters (on the left side from the columns); elements of the punctuation signs, chapter dividers and numbers; crux ansata; several groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts II, III, IV, V, alternating with black lines.

additional.cont: Fol. 24va: Supplication for the donors.
additional.add: Fol. 24va: ለእለ፡ ወሀቡ፡ ዛቲ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ስመ፡ ክርስቲይናሆሙ፡ <…> [ኢይ]ርስዕዎሙ፡ በጊዜ፡ ቍርባን፡ ወዕጣን፡ ወጊዜ፡ ጸሎት። ብሂለክሙ፡ ይጽሐፍ፡ ስሞሙ፡ ኀበ፡ ዐምደ፡ ወርቅ፡ ወተጽሒፎ፡ ኢይደምሰስ፡ ለዓለም፡ አሜን።
additional.det: The names of the donors are erased or washed out.

additional.cont: Fol. 24vb, l. 16: Unclear note.
additional.add: Fol. 24vb, l.16: በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልደ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ። አሐዱ፡ አምላክ። ኵሉ፡ ዘኢያ<...>፡ በእግዚእነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ወዘኢ <…> ። <…> ቶ፡ እማርያም፡ ያ <…> መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ እስከ፡ ም <…> ሐዲስ፡ በከመ፡ ይቤ፡ ጳውሎስ፡ ውጉዘ፡ ለአለመ፡ አለም።

additional.cont: Fol. 61r: Ownership note.
additional.add: Fol. 61r: [ዛ]ቲ፡ ወንጌል፡ ዘተክለ፡ ሰማዕት፡ [ዘተሳ]የጣ፡ በወርቁ፡ ዘ[ተ]አገላ[ወዘአ]ውጽ[አ]፡ <...> ቱ፡ በስልጣነ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡ ው[ጉዘ፡] ለይኩ[ን]፡ አሜን።
additional.tran: Fol. 61r: This is the Gospel (book) of Täklä Sämaˁt who bought is with his own money. Anyone who took it away and brought it out (of the church), let him be excommunicated by the authority of Peter and Paul.
additional.det: The note is difficult to read. It is written in the bottom margin by a hand looking more or less contemporary to the hand of the main text.

additional.cont: Fol. 62vb: Unidentified note (?).
additional.add: Fol. 62vb: በእንተ፡ ብፁዕ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ ሊቀጳጳስነ፡ አባ፡ ማቴዎስ። ወብፀዕ፡ ጳጳስ፡ አባ፡ ማርቆስ፡ እንዘ፡ የ<...>ትኵከ፡ በጸ<…>ሙ፡ ወበሰእ<…>እሰጢፋኖስ፡ ቀዳሚ፡ ሰማእ[ት]
additional.det: By later hand, crude and hardly readable; mentioning Patriarch of Alexandria ʾabba Matthew (III; 1631-46), and Metropolitan of Ethiopia ʾabba Marqos (III; 1634-47/48; s. EAE III, 790a-91b).

additional.cont: Fol. 138va-138vb. Inventory of the manuscripts of ˀAḥzära Maryam.
additional.add: Fol. 138va, l. 7: ኆልቈ፡ መጸሕፍት፡ ዘቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ዘአሕዘራ፡ ዘወሁቡ፡ ምእመናን። ፩ወንጌል። ወ፩ተአምር። ወ፩። ጳውሎስ። ፩ግብር። ፩ሐዋርያ። ፪፡ ቀለምሲስ። ፪ወንጌል፡ ዮሐንስ። ፪፡ ቅዳሴ፡ ፩ፍጹም፡ ወ፩ዘኢፍጹም። ፩፡ ገድለ፡ ሐዋርያት። ወ፩ድርሳነ፡ ቄርሎስ። ፩ገድለ፡ ሚካኤል። ወ፩ገድለ፡ አብርሃም፡ ይስሐቅ። ወያዕቆብ። ፩ገድለ፡ አቡነ፡ ገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ። ፩ገድለ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ቂርቆስ። ፩መጽሐፈ፡ ፍትሐት፡ ወ፩መጽሐፈ፡ ጥምቀት። ወ፩ግጻዌ። ወ፩መዝሙር፡ ፩አርድእት። ወኮነ፡ ድሙር፡ ኵሉ፡ ፳ወ፪መጽሐፍ፡ ዘፈሐቃ፡ ለዛቲ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ በሞሥያጥ። ወለዛቲኒ፡ ዘጸሐፍዋ፡ [fol. 138vb, l.6] ሥዩማነ፡ ክህነት፡ አውገዙ፡ በሰይፈ፡ ቃሎሙ፡ ከመ፡ ኢይስርቅዋ፡ ወኢይሂድዋ፡ ዘእንበለ፡ ለትህርት፡ ወለድግመት፡ እመሂ፡ ዘነሥአ፡ በተጓህልዎ፡ ውጉዘ፡ ይኩን። በአፈ፡ ቆሞሳት፡ ወበሥልጣኖሙ፡ ለአብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ። እስከ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም።
additional.det: The handwriting of the note looks similar to that of Additio 4. If correct, the inventory of the books of ʾAḥzära Maryam could be written between 1634 and 1646 and shows the composition of the church library for that period.

extras.extra: - Fol. 61vb: A note which was washed out.

frames.frame: Fol. 1r (incipit of the Gospel of Mark): elaborate coloured (red and yellow) frontispiece horizontal ornamental band, with three lateral extensions reaching the bottom of the page; the horizontal band extends to the top of the page; interlaces. Fol. 63r (incipit of the Gospel of Matthew): elaborate coloured (red and yellow) frontispiece horizontal ornamental band, with three lateral extensions reaching the bottom of the page; the horizontal band extends to the top of the page; interlaces. Fol. 95r (incipit of the Gospel of John): elaborate coloured (red and yellow) frontispiece horizontal ornamental band, with three lateral extensions reaching the bottom of the page; the horizontal band extends to the top of the page; interlaces. Fol. 139r (incipit of the Gospel of Luke): elaborate coloured (red and yellow) frontispiece horizontal ornamental band, with three lateral extensions reaching the bottom of the page; the horizontal band extends to the top of the page; interlaces.
